reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting the details look even better in person, and appreciate that it fits true to size and is not see-through. Moreover, the material is awesome, the color is perfect, and they consider it good value for money, particularly noting it's perfect for bachelorette parties. However, comfort receives mixed feedback, with some finding it comfortable while others say it's itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved this dress
items.body: Perfect dress for my brothers wedding fit perfect, great style, good stretch, great fabric not see through perfect length, great price & very durable love this dress Read more
items.author: Qveentrophy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!
items.body: This dress fit so cute!! Wore it for a wedding and got a couple compliments. Very comfy Read more
items.author: Emily Rodriguez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth it!
items.body: Used for my wedding reception, the top was a bit big on me because I have a smaller chest but other than that it was beautiful! Worth the cost! Read more
items.author: Tiffany Jacobs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes ma'am!
items.body: But this is A BEAUTIFUL Dress!!!! Color is perfect. Fits true to size. Look the movement and flow. It's resizable with lots of support for my buddy sisters. Material and thickness is wonderful! GET THE DRESS! Read more
items.author: Melaney Scott

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: The colors were off. Did not look as pictured, but the tulle was nice. Read more
items.author: Krystal Jane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty in Lilac
items.body: Wore this dress to celebrate my 50th birthday. I wanted it to be like a fun prom or Quinceanera dress , to mark this milestone, I wore it with a crown. It was perfect! I love the halter straps and the adjustable pull strings in the back. I am petite , but curvy, and it allowed me to adjust the waist to make it tighter. I also love how affordable it was - The material is high quality and I liked the tulle skirt it had under - the color was a pretty , lite purple or lilac For reference , I am 36 DD chest, 26” waist, 38 “ hips, 4’11” (115 pounds) the length was aboit 3” from my knees (tea length) I ordered a small Read more
items.author: Darlene Flores

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very cute but not for me
items.body: Cute! The purple is so light it’s almost white - not see through or anything, just be mindful of how it photographs. The material is heavy and the underskirt gives it a good flare shape. Fabric is a touch plastic-y, not soft but not overtly cheap either. Style gives fifties and fits true to size. Rather low cut for large chest so be mindful if you need to wear a bra it might be hard to find. Not for what I needed but someone else might find this perfect, especially for the price. Read more
items.author: Cami

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars OBSESSED
items.body: So when I bought this dress there were no other reviews. I was hesitant to buy it because I NEEDED a dress for my graduation ceremony. This dress surpassed my expectations for a dress from Amazon!! It is so beautiful and I love it so so much. For references I am 5’3 and 115 lbs. My right hip had a small defect in the sewing where it was higher then the left. It was only noticeable if you were intentionally inspecting the dress though. The halter neck strap had hurt my neck after a few hours but it was bearable when I loosened the straps a bit. The dress has fluffing material under the dress already so there is no need to buy a hoop skirt and it does have a corset back. There is also a zipper under the left arm that travels from under the armpit to the top of your hip. It can in good condition too! I had to steam the dress and all the wrinkles from the packaging came out. Okay, hear me out! I never write reviews but this is now my favorite dress. While the dress does NOT have pockets( an award winning factor) it made me feel like a princess at my high school graduation ceremony while I gave my speeches and for the photo shoot!! Read more
items.author: MRose

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Black, Light Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
